text:
Eastland Herb–Chinese Medicine 17+
[
Eastland Herb
](https://apps.apple.com/cl/developer/eastland-herb/id737380897)
Diseñada para iPad
-
- Gratis
- Ofrece compras dentro de la app
Capturas de pantalla
Descripción
Instantly find the information you need about Chinese herbs and formulas with this app from the authors of Chinese Herbal Medicine: Materia Medica and Formulas & Strategies, the most trusted and widely-used professional references in the field.
KEY FEATURES
• Completely rebuilt to provide better navigation and powerful search by symptoms, findings, actions, and diagnosis.
• Herbs and formulas are searchable by English, pinyin, or Chinese name.
• In-depth analysis of over 530 of the most commonly used herbs, and over 800 formulas, drawn from dozens of classical and modern Chinese sources.
• Virtually all the content of Chinese Herbal Medicine: Materia Medica and Formulas & Strategies
AUTHORS
Dan Bensky
Volker Scheid
Steven Clavey
Randall Barolet
Erich Stoeger
Andrew Ellis
Andrew Gamble
Lilian Lai Bensky (illustrations)
App development by Phil Mitchell. Eastland Herb logo designed by Xie Keqing.
CONTACT
For questions about the app, contact Eastland Press at info@eastlandpress.com.
Novedades
Versión 4.7
Stability improvements to address a crash that some users experienced.
Privacidad de la app
El desarrollador (Eastland Herb) indicó que, entre las prácticas de privacidad de la app, pueden incluirse el manejo de datos que se describe a continuación. Para obtener más información, consulta la
[política de privacidad del desarrollador](https://www.eastlandpress.com/pages/policies).
No se recopilan datos
El desarrollador no recopila ningún dato en esta app.
Las prácticas de privacidad pueden variar; por ejemplo, según tu edad o las funciones que uses.
[Más información](https://apps.apple.com/story/id1538632801)
